Christian queries to Quaking-Christians: Containing [t]hirteen queries modestly propounded to those who are commonly known by the name of Quakers. / [B]y J.B. a Lover of Truth. Batchiler, John, ca. 1615-1674.
[4], 12 p.
Printed for the Author, London, : 1663.
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text. Attributed to J.B., and identified as Wing B97 in unit 34, reel position 1029:15 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
